Texts.Chs: 只需要放置好这个^orange;FTL引擎^reset;，我就可以进行星际旅行了。
Texts.Eng: All I need to do is place the ^orange;FTL Drive^reset; and I can travel through space.

Texts.Chs: 我需要在^orange;加工台^reset;处制作一个^orange;小型FTL引擎^reset;，那样我就能进行星际旅行了。或许我可以找到一处厄尔吉斯晶体矿脉，并从那儿采集一些^green;厄尔吉斯晶体^reset;。
Texts.Eng: To travel through space I need to build a ^orange;Small FTL Drive^reset; on a ^orange;Machining Table^reset;. Maybe I can find an erchius crystal mine and get some ^green;erchius crystals^reset; from there.
